title: Redeem Codes not working
body:
the Redeem Code system sends me this message:

" We apologize, but our store was unable to process your payment at this time. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If you've received this message multiple times, please contact us at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us "

And now it's like that for 28 hours, Riot please help me :(

replies.body: What code were you trying to use? Was this a prepaid RP card or one of the free skin promo codes?
